full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLA MA MCHOD PA DANG 'BREL BA'I BZANG PO SPYOD PA'I SMON LAM GYI RGYAL PO'I 'CHI BSLU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B ('DI LTAR BGYIS PA'I ZHES SOGS KYIS SMON LAM DANG BKRA SHIS KYIS BRGYAN PAR BYA, BZANG PO SPYOD PA'I 'CHI BSLU 'DI BYED LUGS KYANG MI 'DRA BA SNA TSOGS DUG KYANG, BLA MA MCHOD PA DANG 'BREL PA 'DI NI RJE BTZUN DAM PA DZNY'A NA BADZRA GYI SLOB MA THA SHAL BA DKA' BCU BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS BGYIS PA 'DI LA NONGS PA'I TSOGS MCHIS NA MKHAS PA RNAMS KYIS BZOD PAR MDZOD, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
